list.item:
To delete a view, select the view you want to remove using the View combo box.
/images/eiffelstudio/diagram/diagram-defaultview.png

Click the Delete current view button.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/general_delete_icon.png
If you choose to confirm, the view has been deleted, and the "DEFAULT" view is selected.

paragraph.note: Note: You cannot delete the view "DEFAULT".
